parent="1" source="6i3ttUg4z4Qbeq5kNkV3-34" target="6i3ttUg4z4Qbeq5kNkV3-34" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="0jy3AvbBzea-hofKgoxl-1" value="<font color="#ffffff">1. Login via Google&nbsp;</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="90" y="360" width="90" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="0jy3AvbBzea-hofKgoxl-4" value="2.&nbsp;<span style="background-color: initial;">Redirect to google login page</span><div><span style="background-color: initial;">(res-owner auth, auth-server authorize request</span><span style="background-color: initial;">)</span></div>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontColor=#FFFFFF;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-20" y="270" width="217.5" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="0jy3AvbBzea-hofKgoxl-6" value="<font color="#ffffff">Asking for authentication, for request</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="200" y="135" width="130" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="0jy3AvbBzea-hofKgoxl-7" value="<font color="#ffffff">Request for resources</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="250" y="270" width="130" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="0jy3AvbBzea-hofKgoxl-16" value="Request with token" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fillColor=none;fontColor=#FFFFFF;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="230" y="305" width="250" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="0jy3AvbBzea-hofKgoxl-18" value="authorized response/error response" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fillColor=none;fontColor=#FFFFFF;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="290" y="380" width="160" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="0jy3AvbBzea-hofKgoxl-21" value="Request for JWKS" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fillColor=none;fontColor=#FFFFFF;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="430" y="240" width="250" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="0jy3AvbBzea-hofKgoxl-22" value="Response with JWKS" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fillColor=none;fontColor=#FFFFFF;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="50" y="20" width="250" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="0jy3AvbBzea-hofKgoxl-24" value="<h1 style="margin-top: 0px;"><span style="background-color: initial;">HOW JWKS WORKS WITH SPRING?</span></h1><div><font style="font-size: 14px;">Spring requesting for JWKS (JSON Web Key Set) from Google, get response with JWKS, using decoder with JWKS, to verify token sign, it's used for token verification, what protects against falsification.</font></div>" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;fontColor=#FFFFFF;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-110" y="465" width="690" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

Resource owner of:
- backend resource-server,
- Google resource-server
data, like email, username or smth else

div.font: Spring requesting for JWKS (JSON Web Key Set) from Google, get response with JWKS, using decoder with JWKS, to verify token sign, it's used for token verification, what protects against falsification.

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
